actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1200 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 37. Record Vote Number: 154.

Amendment SA 1200 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S4644-4651, S4657; text as modified: CR S4644-4650) To provide for enhanced border security, including strong border security metrics and congressional votes on border security and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1200 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 37. Record Vote Number: 154.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1200 proposed by Senator Paul.

purpose: To provide for enhanced border security, including strong border security metrics and congressional votes on border security and for other purposes.
